channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-13546] NPE on region server status page if all masters are down
item.description: while trying to debug a cluster with all masters down, I noticed going to the region server status page failed with NPE.
item.summary: NPE on region server status page if all masters are down

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
